name: Food Quest!
description:
Food Quest!! How did you get here, you don't know! maybe the mysterious food appearing in the ground has the answer! Traverse through 5 unique levels and reach the portals to escape this mysterious forest. 

Submission for LCAD 48 Hour Game Jam 2022.

Theme: "The Environment Changes You"

Credits:

Micheal Wolf - Game Designer/Engineer

Sean Elston - 3D Artist

Adrian Montano- 3D Artist

Zoi Meaders - VFX Technical Art
